title: EverCommerce CEO Eric Remer sells shares worth $265,206
author: Investing.com
excerpt: EverCommerce CEO Eric Remer sells shares worth $265,206
text: The sales involved a total of 22,834 shares of EverCommerce's common stock, with prices ranging from $11.2198 to $11.9898 per share.
